segments.text: I notice the woman’s foot is already in the water, but she’s still drying that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is stretching so far, and the stool is barely holding him up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just waiting, completely trusting him not to fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe how much water is pouring out of the sink now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is so focused on her task, she doesn’t see anything else.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is going to drop that plate if he’s not careful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the girl is going to be disappointed if he falls before she gets her cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is getting closer to the stool, and it’s going to make everything slippery.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the woman will ever turn around and see what’s happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is just chaotic, and no one seems to care.
segments.speaker: PAR
